title: Ticket #6023: Dely ssh-to-job exit on removal until end job terminates.
description:
Chad Hanna wrote: 

> I have noticed that condor_ssh_to_job kicks users off of the remote nodes
> as soon as condor_rm is issued even if the remote process hasn't actually
> exited.  This is annoying when trying to debug if a process is exiting
> properly :) If it is an easy fix, it would be quite nice to have it wait
> until the remote process is actually dead.

And Stuart Anderson replied: 

> For reference this is on SL7 running Condor 8.4.9 at CIT, and I agree
> waiting for the last job process to exit before terminating any
> condor_ssh_to_job secessions would be a helpful enhancement.
creator: tlmiller
